text:
Hi Everyone,

HubSpot recently released a new React-based extension on the CRM card, which inspired me to create a brand new CRM card on the backend. Everything was running smoothly until yesterday, but this morning I encountered an error message and the app logs are not showing any clues. I could really use some assistance with this.

Thanks,
Prasad

:wave: hey <@U04L9MBL308> glad to hear you're trying out the new tools. this is the error that's shown when the serverless function execution fails. can you check the serverless function logs to see if there might be errors in there? also, are there any relevant errors in the browser console?
That logs panel should show the serverless function logs as well <@UNHBK8QNM>
<@U04L9MBL308> it's because of the additional tabs alpha/beta. <@U03FJQPSC0Y> can unenroll you
